welcome_message_body: "Welcome to The Valley, Anguilla! Known for its pristine beaches and charming Caribbean atmosphere, we invite you to relax and explore our beautiful city. Enjoy your stay and all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wallblake Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Esperance Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Esperance Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gustaf III (St-Jean) Airport handles all commercial flights and has a small waiting area for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gustaf III (St-Jean) Airport is used for private and charter flights and offers a more luxurious waiting area for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
